definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
a cuckold/to be cuckolded by one's wife

sentences.english: Were you the clerk that is to make me a cuckold?
sentences.chinese: 你就是讓我戴綠帽子的文員？

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold .
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王本人被描繪成一個被人戴綠帽子的軟弱之人。

sentences.english: He was cuckolded by his best friend.
sentences.chinese: 他最好的朋友給他戴了綠帽子。

sentences.english: Must he be a cuckold for the rest of his life?
sentences.chinese: 他這輩子都得戴綠帽子嗎？

sentences.english: You believe she cuckolded her husband?
sentences.chinese: 你相信她給他丈夫戴了綠帽子？

sentences.english: Thus, few manufacturers supply green hats or scarves.
sentences.chinese: 所以，生產商都不怎麼生產綠頭巾和綠帽子。

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold.
sentences.chinese: 亞瑟王本人被描繪成一個被人戴綠帽子的軟弱之人。

sentences.english: Were you the clerk that is to make me cuckold ?
sentences.chinese: 你就是那個給我戴綠帽子的助手？

sentences.english: You should keep your wife under control, aren't you afraid of being cuckolded ?
sentences.chinese: 你也不管管你媳婦，就不怕戴綠帽子？

sentences.english: Matt: I don't wanna be a chump .
sentences.chinese: 我不想當戴綠帽子的傻瓜。

sentences.english: Can't be a so fierce and ruddy good Tong surname almond wall to call four the elder brother took a cuckold husband?
sentences.chinese: 不會是佟佳氏這麼猛紅杏出牆叫四阿哥帶綠帽子了吧？

definition: lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
lit. one palm alone cannot clap (proverb)/fig. it takes two persons to start a dispute/it takes two to tango/it's difficult to achieve anything without support
pinyin: yi1 ge5 ba1 zhang3 pai1 bu4 xiang3

definition: to lose money instead of being paid (i.e. sb should pay me, but is actually taking my money)
richly bedecked/dripping with gold and silver (idiom)
weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
lit. two segments with a single cut (idiom)/fig. to make a clean break (idiom)
that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of
